main event: Several military and civilian observers in Salamanca, New York saw unidentified objects that appeared to be subjected to air interception.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 105 seconds., The objects were maneuverable and appeared to touch each other., Spectrographic analysis showed the objects to be radar chaff., A letter mentioned thousands of silver-colored objects traveling northwest., Witnesses reported feeling a tingle in their hands after touching a metal sample.
